column4: Hey, I am a new Ubuntu user (I love it... almost done configuring) and I need help with configuring my sound card (Sound Blaster Audigy 2)
I don't think that it has loaded the proper drivers..... The sound works, but on 2.1
you nead to enable a 5.1 plugin
i cannot find it, you should send an e-mail to ubuntu-users@lists.ubuntu.com asking for help
Thanks a lot for the attempt.
thanks. I will go try that.
this should help (as root): cd /home; for X in * chown -R $X:$X $X
this should help (as root): cd /home; for X in *; do chown -R $X:$X $X; done
That looks complicated.. Will try it.
so type it in exactly like this "cd /home; for X in *; do chown -R $X:$X $X; done" on one line?
